thread.title: How do I deal with my husband's credit card black hole?
thread.title_full: How do I deal with my husband's credit card black hole? | Money | The Guardian

title: How do I deal with my husband's credit card black hole?
text:
Every week a Guardian Money reader submits a question, and it’s up to you to help him or her out – a selection of the best answers will appear in next Saturday’s paper.
This week’s question: Among my husband’s papers I recently found a (badly) hidden £9,000 bill for a credit card I didn’t even know he had. I’m furious – and expect he’ll go mad when I confront him. If there’s a less bad way to deal with this, what is it?
Do you have a problem readers could solve? Email your suggestions to money@theguardian.com or write to us at Money, The Guardian, Kings Place, 90 York Way, London N1 9GU
